00073 void CreateIMPPersonalityEntranceButtons( void )
00074 {
00075   // this function will create the buttons needed for the IMP personality Page
00076 
00077       // ths begin button
00078   giIMPPersonalityEntranceButtonImage[0]=  LoadButtonImage( "LAPTOP\\button_2.sti" ,-1,0,-1,1,-1 );
00079       /*giIMPPersonalityEntranceButton[0] = QuickCreateButton( giIMPPersonalityEntranceButtonImage[0], LAPTOP_SCREEN_UL_X +  ( 136 ), LAPTOP_SCREEN_WEB_UL_Y + ( 314 ),
00080                                                             BUTTON_TOGGLE, MSYS_PRIORITY_HIGHEST - 1,
00081                                                             BtnGenericMouseMoveButtonCallback, (GUI_CALLBACK)BtnIMPPersonalityEntranceDoneCallback);
00082 */
00083             giIMPPersonalityEntranceButton[0] = CreateIconAndTextButton( giIMPPersonalityEntranceButtonImage[0], pImpButtonText[ 1 ], FONT12ARIAL, 
00084                                                                                      FONT_WHITE, DEFAULT_SHADOW, 
00085                                                                                      FONT_WHITE, DEFAULT_SHADOW, 
00086                                                                                      TEXT_CJUSTIFIED, 
00087                                                                                      LAPTOP_SCREEN_UL_X +  ( 136 ), LAPTOP_SCREEN_WEB_UL_Y + ( 314 ), BUTTON_TOGGLE, MSYS_PRIORITY_HIGH,
00088                                                                                           BtnGenericMouseMoveButtonCallback, (GUI_CALLBACK)BtnIMPPersonalityEntranceDoneCallback);
00089 
00090   
00091       SetButtonCursor(giIMPPersonalityEntranceButton[0], CURSOR_WWW);
00092 
00093       return;

00096 void DestroyIMPPersonalityEntranceButtons( void )

00108 void BtnIMPPersonalityEntranceDoneCallback(GUI_BUTTON *btn,INT32 reason)
00109 {
00110 
00111       // btn callback for IMP Begin Screen done button
00112       if (!(btn->uiFlags & BUTTON_ENABLED))
00113             return;
00114 
00115       if( reason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_LBUTTON_DWN )
00116       {
00117              btn->uiFlags|=(BUTTON_CLICKED_ON);
00118      
00119       }
00120       else if( reason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_LBUTTON_UP )
00121       {
00122             if (btn->uiFlags & BUTTON_CLICKED_ON)
00123             {
00124       btn->uiFlags&=~(BUTTON_CLICKED_ON);
00125               // done with begin screen, next screen
00126                   iCurrentImpPage = IMP_PERSONALITY_QUIZ;
00127               fButtonPendingFlag = TRUE;
00128             }
00129       }
00130 }
